subject: Project kickoff on Monday
body:
Hi Bob,

As discussed with Dr. Sarah Lee and Michael Brown, let's kick off the project on Monday at 10am.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Updated timeline
body:
Hi Sarah,

I spoke with Jennifer Davis and Mark Wilson. They agreed to the revised timeline.

Best,
Michael

subject: Meeting follow-up
body:
Hi Linda,

Thanks for meeting today with Daniel Garcia. Could you share the notes with Karen and Thomas?

Regards,
Robert

subject: Vendor intro
body:
Hi Andrew,

Please meet Charles Johnson from Acme Corp. He'll coordinate with Emily Roberts on contracts.

Cheers,
Jessica

subject: Action items
body:
Hi Patricia,

Per our chat with Dr. Steven Harris and Barbara Young, let's finalize the spec by Friday.

Thanks,
David}
